comments.description: This section of the JSON is not used by the repo, but instead describes this file's functionality.
comments.sdk_version: Controls the .NET SDK used by the repo.  version should always be set to the current .NET 6 SDK.
comments.sdk_rollForward1: Will roll forward to the .NET 7 SDK if it's been downloaded because of the rollForward=LatestMajor line.
comments.sdk_rollForward2: However, will always respect the .NET version specified by init.cmd (.NET 7 SDKs can produce .NET 6 apps)
comments.msbuild-sdks_NoTargets1: Installs the Microsoft.Build.NoTargets SDK, used for .NET SDK-style projects that
comments.msbuild-sdks_NoTargets2: don't actually need .NET.  These projects perform build operations like binplacing.
comments.msbuild-sdks_EngCommon: Used by Maestro for managing packages/dependencies
